name: Diabetes Prediction Research
description: Extended research on diabetes prediction using machine learning and Explainable AI (XAI). Advanced models focusing on prediction accuracy and interpretability.

name: Mindful Breaks
description: Pomodoro timer website designed to help manage screen time and prevent overwork. Features breathing exercises and work session tracking.

name: MiniLang Interpreter
description: A Python-based programming language interpreter from scratch. Supports variables, loops, lists, conditionals, and more.

name: Book Recommendation System
description: Goodreads scraper and machine learning-based book recommendation system. Analyzes reading patterns to suggest personalized recommendations.

name: Patient Experience AI
description: Research-based project exploring how AI can improve patient experience in healthcare settings. Predictive models for healthcare optimization.

name: Data Mining & Patient Analysis
description: Working with patient appointment datasets to determine likelihood of attendance using data mining and machine learning techniques.

name: Real-Time Chat App
description: IoT chat application with RSA encryption and decryption. Built with Python and Tkinter for secure real-time communication.

name: Recipe Roulette
description: Dynamic recipe generator based on dietary requirements. Web application built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

name: Car Insurance System
description: Comprehensive car insurance data management dashboard using PHP. Handles policy management and customer data.

name: 3D Computer Graphics
description: Advanced 3D graphics programming in C++. Exploring rendering, transformations, and computer graphics principles.
